entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
